name: Heir
main text:
1 Attack

1 Victory

Trash Heir if it is used in a battle that loses.

name: General
main text:
3 Attack

3 Victory

Trash General if it is involved in a battle that loses.

name: Castle
main text:
5 Victory

2 Defense

1 Hand Size

Place Castle on a territory you control. Castle is also lost if you lose the territory.

name: Royal Wedding
main text:
Choose a card from your deck, and place it into your hand.

10 Victory

Gain a Heir.
